variables.uptime: Friendly uptime of the current Telegram session.
variables.chat_title: Title or name of the latest chat.
variables.chat_id: Chat ID of the latest message.
variables.chat_type: Chat type of the latest message (private, group, supergroup, channel).
variables.session_chat_count: Number of chat messages seen in the current session.
variables.current_first_chatter: First chatter username for the current session.
variables.previous_first_chatter: First chatter username from previous session.
variables.last_chatter: Username of the latest chat message author.
variables.last_user_id: User ID of the latest chat message author.
variables.last_message: Text of the latest Telegram message.
variables.last_message_id: Message ID of the latest Telegram message.
variables.last_message_at: ISO timestamp of the latest Telegram message.
variables.member_count: Member count for the selected chat (if available).
